seo.title: Riomaggiore Apartments 2025 | Vacation Rentals & Airbnb
seo.description: Rent an apartment in Riomaggiore's colorful tower-houses. Self-catering vacation rentals with kitchens, terraces, and authentic village living.

body.title: Live Like a Local in Tower-Houses
body.subtitle: Rent your own apartment in traditional Ligurian buildings. Enjoy full kitchens, private terraces, and the freedom to experience village life at your own pace.

features.title: Traditional Tower-Houses
features.description: Stay in historic colorful buildings stacked on the cliffsides, restored with modern comforts

features.title: Full Kitchens
features.description: Cook with fresh ingredients from local markets and prepare traditional Ligurian meals

features.title: Private Terraces
features.description: Many apartments feature balconies or rooftop terraces with harbor or sea views

features.title: Family-Friendly
features.description: Spacious options perfect for families and groups seeking more room than hotels

features.title: Value for Groups
features.description: More economical for longer stays and multiple guests compared to hotel rooms

features.title: Central Locations
features.description: Apartments throughout the village, from harbor area to quiet residential streets

body.title: Compare Accommodation Options
body.description: Explore hotels and other lodging types to find the perfect fit for your Riomaggiore stay.
